text: Kris King (born February 18, 1966 in Bracebridge, Ontario) is a Canadian retired ice hockey left winger that played for the Chicago Blackhawks, Washington Capitals, New York Rangers, Toronto Maple Leafs, Phoenix Coyotes and the Winnipeg Jets. ==Other websites== * Category:1966 births Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Living people Category:New York Rangers players Category:Phoenix Coyotes players Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players Category:Winnipeg Jets (1979â€“96) players Category:Ontario Hockey League players
title: Kris King
